newsitem.title: USA: Transcend Therapeutics and H.T.E. IPOs postponed.
newsitem.headline: Transcend Therapeutics and H.T.E. IPOs postponed.

text.p: Transcend Therapeutics Inc's initial public offering (IPO) has been postponed for market conditions, said underwriter Vector Securities International Inc.
Transcend had expected to price 2.0 million shares at between $12 and $14 per share. The Transcend deal was supposed to price during the week of May 5.
Transcend, based in Cambridge, Massachusetts, develops novel pharmaceuticals for the treatment of diseases associated with oxidative stress and resultant tissue damage.
In addition, another IPO, H.T.E. Inc, has been postponed, said underwriter Volpe, Welty & Co.
H.T.E. had expected to price 2.5 million shares at between $11 and $13 per share. The H.T.E. deal was expected to price in late April.
H.T.E., based in Orlando, Florida, develops, markets, implements and supports fully-integrated enterprise-wide software applications.
Volpe gave no reason for the postponement of H.T.E.
